about.summary: Unified and scalable interface for multidimensional arrays

name: bolt-python
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "bolt-python" %}
{% set version = "0.7.1" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 8b10c945fe202465e54492599dc8f92cef6f7c244a86d6ca11d651f58ee1d3ab

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - numpy
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - bolt
    - bolt.local
    - bolt.spark

about:
  home: "https://github.com/bolt-project/bolt"
  license: "APACHE-2.0"
  license_family: "APACHE"
  license_file: "LICENSE"
  summary: "Unified and scalable interface for multidimensional arrays"
  doc_url: "https://pypi.org/project/bolt-python/"
  dev_url: "https://github.com/bolt-project/bolt"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mwilson8
    - dcunn
    - oblute
    - rluria14
    - benhuff
